original_text: And the king went forth, and all his household after him. And the king left ten women, which were concubines, to keep the house.
korean_text: 왕이 나갈 때에 그의 가족을 다 따르게 하고 후궁 열 명을 왕이 남겨 두어 왕궁을 지키게 하니라

sentences.original_text: and all his household after him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 모든 가속이 그 뒤를 따랐다

sentences.original_text: And the king left ten women
